summary: Non-replacer skins for daedric weapons,adds weapons from Hyperdimention Neptunia Victory
descriptionHtml:
Non-replacer skins for daedric weapons,adds weapons from Hyperdimention Neptunia Victory
<br />
<br />Installation:Go to Documents>My Games>SkyrimOpen SkyrimPrefs.ini,look for the line bEnableFileSelection (use ctrl+f in the Notepad),set the value to 1Click and drag the "data" folder to your game directory.Select and tick NEP_WEAPS in Skyrim launcher and place at bottom of load order.Obtain:At any forge under the "Daedric" tab
author: BadnewsGoodnewsAndFauxnews
